0.6.name: wordpress/the-free-musician-player
0.6.description:
HTML5 MP3 player with Flash Fallback. Play music while browsing your site - 100$ AJAX enabled!

Also allows you to organise Artists/Albums/Songs from your wordpress dashboard and display them in your pages/posts via shortcodes.

To see a live demo and instructions go to http://thefreemusician.com/wordpress-plugin
